title: Fragments, ca. 1775
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave foundation
dimensions:
A. Warp: 107.5cm (42 1/4in.). Weft: 70.5cm (27 3/4in.). Right selvedge present. B. Warp: 91cm (35 3/4in.). Weft: 41cm (16 1/4in.). All edges cut. C. Warp: 108cm (42 1/2in.). Weft: 30cm (11 3/4in.). Left selvedge present. D. Warp: 28cm (11 in.). Weft: 30cm (11 3/4in.). All edges cut.
Pattern: Height of repeat: 99cm (39 in.).
Designed so that when lengths of fabric are sewn together correctly the pattern forms a straight repeat.
description: Four chinoiserie scenes; two of children at play, the other two with adults under improbable structures. In red on white.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragments, ca. 1775.
ca. 1775. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved plate on plain weave foundation. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-74-a/d.
